TopicTitle: How do you improve your title? eg Bottle Rocketeer

Articles.Content: How do you improve you title thing? eg Bottle Rocketeer.

Basically, just post. Posts in the off-topic section (Space Lounge) and Forum Games don't count, from memory, but yeah, just basically interact with other people on the forums. You can have a custom title if you want; you can change that under Settings, I think.
